h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Laurel Buds Location
content: The Laurel Buds can be found past the Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw boss to the left of the Sandgate Village - Village Entrance Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. Head towards where you will fight the King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince. Just before that boss arena, you will see a statue.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Laurel_Buds.md', within the main section titled 'Laurel Buds', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Laurel Buds Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Laurel Buds can be found past the Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw boss to the left of the Sandgate Village - Village Entrance Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. Head towards where you will fight the King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince. Just before that boss arena, you will see a statue.
